about_the_game:
Attention.

This game is a gyro-only game. Please make sure that your controller is equipped with a gyro function before purchasing.
The Xbox controller cannot be used for this game because it does not have a gyro function.

Operation-confirmed controllers

DualSense, DUALSHOCK 4, Nintendo Switch Pro Controller

Features

Roll around with the gyro control! Overcome numerous gimmicks to reach the goal!

Korokoro is a gyro-only casual game. A total of 50 stages. Tilt and roll 5 balls of different shapes to reach the goal.

It is recommended to play “NORMAL MODE” first. The difficulty level increases considerably after stage 3. In “REVERSE MODE ‘ you can reverse the operation, and in “SURVIVAL MODE” is a through-play mode for advanced players. If you are confident in your skills, you should play this game.

Tips of the game

Take your time and don't rush. Don't get frustrated if you make a mistake. Accuracy over speed.
